member.name: ID3D10Effect.GetConstantBufferByIndex
member.summary: Get a constant buffer by index.

member.name: ID3D10Effect.GetConstantBufferByName
member.summary: Get a constant buffer by name.
member.returns: A pointer to the constant buffer indicated by the Name. See .

member.name: ID3D10Effect.GetDesc
member.param: A pointer to an effect description (see ).
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10Effect.GetDevice
member.summary: Get the device that created the effect.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10Effect.GetTechniqueByName
member.returns: A pointer to an , or NULL if the technique is not found.

member.name: ID3D10Effect.GetVariableBySemantic
member.returns: A pointer to the effect variable indicated by the Semantic. See .

member.name: ID3D10Effect.IsOptimized
member.summary: Test an effect to see if the reflection metadata has been removed from memory.
member.returns: TRUE if the effect is optimized; otherwise FALSE.

member.name: ID3D10Effect.IsPool
member.summary: Test an effect to see if it is part of a memory pool.
member.returns: TRUE if the effect is pooled; otherwise FALSE. See .

member.name: ID3D10Effect.IsValid
member.summary: Test an effect to see if it contains valid syntax.
member.returns: TRUE if the code syntax is valid; otherwise FALSE.

member.name: ID3D10Effect.Optimize
member.summary: Minimize the amount of memory required for an effect.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.
